faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Common questions about Nexora. Can't find what you're looking for?

items.question: What types of properties does Nexora support?
items.answer: Nexora is designed for small to medium-sized hospitality properties including B&Bs (5-15 rooms), Resort Villaggi (20-100 units), Open Air Resorts (50-200 sites), and Small Hotels (15-100 rooms). We focus on properties in Italy and Brazil.

items.question: How does pricing work?
items.answer: Pricing is per property per month. Plans start at €49/month for basic property management, €99/month for channel manager integration, and €199/month for full features including analytics and fiscal compliance. No per-user fees.

items.question: Can I migrate from Scidoo or other systems?
items.answer: Yes! We provide data migration services to import your properties, rooms, and bookings from Scidoo, Cloudbeds, or other PMS systems. Migration is included in our onboarding process.

items.question: Is Italian fiscal compliance included?
items.answer: Absolutely. Nexora is built for Italian hospitality with native support for CIN, CIR, VAT numbers, ISTAT reporting, tourist tax calculation, and electronic invoicing. We also support Brazilian fiscal requirements.

items.question: Which channel managers do you integrate with?
items.answer: We integrate with RoomCloud for connections to Airbnb, Booking.com, Expedia, Trivago, and 100+ other OTAs. Direct integrations (bypassing RoomCloud) are on our roadmap.

items.question: Do you support multi-property management?
items.answer: Yes! Nexora is built for multi-property from day one. Manage unlimited properties under one organization account with role-based access for different staff members.
